auth.login_description: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.register_description: Sign up and start using StudyPlanner
auth.account_created_message: Your account has been successfully created

dashboard.title: Welcome, {username}!
dashboard.subtitle: Here's a summary of your learning progress
dashboard.no_tasks_description: You don't have any tasks. Create your first task to get started

pages.subjects_description: Manage your subjects and learning topics
pages.no_subjects_description: Create your first subject to start your learning plan
pages.no_subjects_created: You haven't created any subjects yet
pages.no_tasks_description: Create your first task to get started
pages.task_back_to_todo: Task moved back to To Do list
pages.task_moved_to_todo: Task moved to To Do list

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: View and manage your study schedule
schedule.no_events_description: Generate a schedule or manually add events to get started
schedule.no_events_today_description: You have a free day! Plan your study time
schedule.generate_description: Automatically schedule study sessions for selected subjects. The system will distribute tasks across available time with breaks in mind.

pages.statistics_description: Track your learning progress and performance
pages.statistics_info: Statistics are calculated based on completed tasks

landing.hero_title: A study plan that actually works
landing.hero_subtitle: StudyPlanner helps you organize resources, track progress, and achieve your educational goals
landing.features_subtitle: Everything you need for effective studying

feature_organization.title: Organization
feature_organization.description: Manage subjects and tasks in one place

landing.step_3_description: AI creates an optimal study plan
landing.testimonials_subtitle: Hear what StudyPlanner users have to say
landing.testimonial_1: StudyPlanner changed my studies. I've never been so organized!
landing.testimonial_2: I love using the schedule. Now I have time to relax.
landing.testimonial_3: Analytics help me see where I'm wasting time. Highly recommended!
landing.testimonial_4: The best study planning tool. Worth trying!
landing.faq_a1: Yes! StudyPlanner is completely free to use. No hidden fees.
landing.faq_q2: Do I need a credit card?
landing.faq_a2: No, we don't require any credit card information. Sign up for free!
landing.faq_q3: Can I use it on multiple devices?
landing.faq_a3: Yes, your data syncs across all your devices.
landing.faq_a4: Of course! We use SSL encryption and secure servers.
landing.faq_a5: Yes, you can download all your data in CSV or JSON format.
landing.faq_a6: Email us at support@studyplanner.com or use the contact form.
landing.cta_section_description: Join thousands of students already planning their studies with StudyPlanner
landing.footer_tagline: A study planning tool for students who want to achieve more

settings.language_description: Choose your preferred user interface language
settings.default_task_view_description: Choose whether tasks should be displayed in list or Kanban view by default
settings.default_schedule_hours_description: Choose whether the schedule should display business hours only or all 24 hours by default

forms.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
forms.subject: Subject
forms.estimated_time_min: Estimated time must be at least 15 minutes

dialogs.confirm_delete_subject: Are you sure you want to delete this subject?
dialogs.confirm_delete_task: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
dialogs.complete_task_description: How many minutes did it take to complete this task?
dialogs.end_date_help: If not set, schedule will be generated until the final deadline
dialogs.threshold_help: If a study block exceeds this time, add a break

register.title: Registration Complete
register.description: Your account has been created. You can now log in.

subject_created.description: New subject has been successfully added.

status_changed.title: Status Changed
status_changed.description: Task status has been successfully changed.

schedule_created.title: Schedule Added
schedule_created.description: New schedule entry has been added.

schedule_updated.title: Schedule Updated
schedule_updated.description: Changes to the schedule have been saved.

logout.title: Logged Out
logout.description: You have been logged out of the application.

user_not_found.title: User Not Found
user_not_found.description: A user with this email doesn't exist.

email_taken.title: Email Already in Use
email_taken.description: This email is already associated with another account.

register_failed.title: Registration Failed
register_failed.description: Check your information and try again.

network_error.title: Network Error
network_error.description: Check your internet connection and try again.

server_error.title: Server Error
server_error.description: The server is not responding. Try again later.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.description: You don't have permission for this action.

validation_error.title: Validation Error
validation_error.description: Check that your information is correct.

required_field.title: Required Field
required_field.description: Please fill in all required fields.

invalid_email.title: Invalid Email
invalid_email.description: Please enter a valid email address.

password_too_short.title: Password Too Short
password_too_short.description: Password must be at least 6 characters.

field_errors.username: Username must be between 3 and 50 characters
field_errors.password: Password must be at least 8 characters
field_errors.title: Title is required and must be between 1 and 255 characters
field_errors.name: Name is required and must be between 1 and 255 characters
field_errors.description: Description cannot be longer than 2000 characters
field_errors.estimated_minutes: Estimated time must be between 15 and 480 minutes
field_errors.actual_minutes: Actual time must be between 15 and 1440 minutes
field_errors.priority: Priority must be: low, medium, high, or urgent
field_errors.status: Status must be: to do, in progress, or done

field_validation.email_taken: This email is associated with another account
field_validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
field_validation.username_min_length: Username must be at least 3 characters
field_validation.title_too_long: Title cannot be longer than 255 characters
field_validation.name_too_long: Name cannot be longer than 255 characters
field_validation.description_too_long: Description cannot be longer than 2000 characters
field_validation.description_subject_too_long: Subject description cannot be longer than 1000 characters
field_validation.estimated_minutes_min: Estimated time must be at least 15 minutes
field_validation.actual_minutes_min: Actual time must be at least 15 minutes

unsaved_changes.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved_changes.description: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?

session_expiring.title: Session Expiring
session_expiring.description: Your session expires in a few minutes. Log in again.

low_storage.title: Low Storage
low_storage.description: Clear your data or try on another device.

approaching_deadline.title: Approaching Deadline
approaching_deadline.description: Reminder: This task will be due soon.

no_scheduled_tasks.title: No Scheduled Tasks
no_scheduled_tasks.description: You don't have any scheduled tasks for today.

high_workload.title: High Workload
high_workload.description: You have many tasks. Consider spreading them over more days.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.description: You are in the Study Planner application.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: Please wait for the operation to complete.

empty_list.title: List is Empty
empty_list.description: Create a new item to get started.

schedule_generation.short_break_error: Short break must be between 1 and 60 minutes
schedule_generation.medium_break_error: Medium break must be between 1 and 60 minutes
schedule_generation.long_break_error: Long break must be between 1 and 120 minutes
schedule_generation.threshold_error: Long break threshold must be between 15 and 480 minutes
